Plot: David is too afraid to commit to his girlfriend Sarah, who is pressuring him to get married. While she goes away to New York for work for two months, David's friends persuade him to experience the dating scene one more time. Meanwhile, David's womanizing friend Mike gets drunk one night and mistakenly believes he has slept with a man, and afterwards makes several awkward attempts to come out of the closet - even though he isn't really gay.
starring: Jerry O'Connell Bridgette Wilson Alyssa Milano Ryan Reynolds Annabeth Gish
